_header: All is good but best is this
_description: A couplet at the end of a prose ‘most souereyn medycyn for the pestilence’

CamMagPep1047.Transcription:
All ys gode but best ys thysGod graunte vs all hevyn
                    blysse
CamMagPep1047.Facsimiles:
Hodgett,  G. A. J.,
                        ed.  
             Stere Htt Well: a book of medieval refinements, recipes and remedies,
                from a manuscript in Samuel Pepys’s library.
         Adelaide: Mary Martin Books, [1970?]; Cambridge, 1972.
